long_description: Simple-to-use Aquamira water treatment drops use chlorine dioxide to kill odor-causing bacteria and enhance the taste of stored potable water. Drops are effective in clear, muddy, warm and cold water. Chlorine dioxide is iodine and chlorine free and has been used by municipal water treatment plants to kill a variety of waterborne pathogens since the late 1940s. Chlorine dioxide has been shown to remove greater than 99.9% of bacteria, viruses and cysts, including Cryptosporidium and Giardia. Chlorine dioxide does not discolor water or give it an unpleasant taste. Includes part A and part B drops that you mix together before adding to water; each bottle contains 1 fl. oz. Small size and long shelf life make Aquamira water treatment drops a great choice for international travel, backpacking and emergency preparedness. The Aquamira water treatment drops kit contains everything you need to treat up to 30 gal. of water.
